article: Jim was a farmer . He lived in a village far away from the town . One day he was very ill , and everyone thought he would die . But his family would n ' t give up . They decided to sent for a doctor in town . The doctor arrived the village two days later and looked over the man . The doctor wanted a pen and some paper , But there was no pen or paper in the village , because nobody could read or write . The doctor looked around and picked up a piece of burnt wood . Using the wood , he wrote the name of the medicine on the door of the house . " Get the medicine for him right away , " he said , " and he will soon get well . ' family and friends did not know what to do . They could not read the writing . Then the village baker had an idea . He took off the door of the house and took the door to the nearest town . He bought the medicine , and Jim was saved . After that Jim would not let anyone wash the magic words off the door .

there was no pen or paper in the village
